lentil.quote: Me at a whopping one whole year old!
I was 2 here. I think you can tell from the pic I'm not obsessed with bathtime.
I was 8 moths here. Laying in the sun after a nice walk is one of my favorite things to do!
Little baby me was simply only 3 months old here. I IMMEDIATELY started chewing my mom's pillows.
I was 5 months old here! I loved taking walks around the city as a little pup.
This is my current age! I love being 3!
